sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="ecc_agent_script_include"><ecc_agent_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Used to retrieve data from Service-now to export to mid server or a customer's FTP(S) server.</description><name>CFDataRetriever</name><script>var CFDataRetriever = Class.create();

CFDataRetriever.prototype = {
   initialize: function() {
      ///// Parameters that can be set from this script
      //
      this.debug = false;
      
      //If you would like to move processed files to a target location, set the next two parameters.
      //Make sure your file name ends up being unique. We will not overwrite a file by the same name
      //in the target directory...
      this.moveProcessedFiles = false;
      this.MIDSERVER_PROCESSED_FILE_PATH = "processed/";
      //
      /////
      
      this.resLog = "FTP Log: \n";
      this.log("Initializing CFDataRetriever");
      this.MIDSERVER_FILE_PATH = "work" + Packages.java.io.File.separator;
      
      this.MIDSERVER_FILE_NAME = probe.getParameter('targetFileName');
      this.sortField = probe.getParameter('sortField');
      this.table = probe.getParameter('table');
      
      
      this.useProxy = this.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.use_proxy");
      if (this.useProxy){
         this.proxyHost =this.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.host");
         this.proxyPort =this.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.port");
         this.proxyUser =this.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.username");
         this.proxyPass =this.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.password");
      }
      this.user =    this.getConfigParameter("mid.instance.username");
      this.password = this.getConfigParameter("mid.instance.password");
      
      var ftpCredArr = this.decryptCredentials(probe.getParameter('ftpCred'));
      this.ftpUser = ftpCredArr[0];
      this.ftpPass =  ftpCredArr[1];
      
      this.ftpTargetServer = probe.getParameter('ftpTargetServer');
      this.ftpPort = (this.isANumber(probe.getParameter('ftpPort'))) ? (probe.getParameter('ftpPort')) : null;
      
      this.targetPath = probe.getParameter('targetPath')+"";
      
      var lastCharPos = this.targetPath.length-1;
      if(this.targetPath.charAt(lastCharPos) != Packages.java.io.File.separator)
         this.targetPath = this.targetPath + Packages.java.io.File.separator;
      
      this.targetFileName = probe.getParameter('targetFileName');
      
      this.reportURL = probe.getParameter('reportURL');
      this.format =  probe.getParameter('format');
      this.referenceFields = probe.getParameter('referenceFields');
      this.filter =  encodeURI(probe.getParameter('filter'));
      
      if (this.format.indexOf('DELIM') != -1)
         this.format = "DELIM&sysparm_delimiter=" + encodeURI(probe.getParameter('delimiter'));
      else if (this.referenceFields == "Display name")
         this.format = "CF_XML&sysparm_table="+this.table+"&sysparm_reference=displayValue";
      
      this.reportURL = this.reportURL + "&" + this.format;
      
      if (this.referenceFields == "Both")
         this.reportURL = this.reportURL + "&useUnloadFormat=true";
      
      this.lastRunDateTime = probe.getParameter('lastRunDateTime');
      this.chunkData = probe.getParameter('chunkData');
      this.numberOfChunks = probe.getParameter('numberOfChunks');
      this.recordsPerChunk = probe.getParameter('recordsPerChunk');
      
      
      this.parmQuery = "";
      
      if (this.lastRunDateTime && this.filter){
         this.parmQuery += "&sysparm_query=sys_updated_on>" + this.lastRunDateTime + "%5E" + this.filter;
      }
      else if (this.lastRunDateTime){
         this.parmQuery += "&sysparm_query=sys_updated_on>" + this.lastRunDateTime;
      }
      else if (this.filter){
         this.parmQuery += "&sysparm_query=" + this.filter;
      }
      
      if (this.chunkData){
         this.reportURL += "&sysparm_order="+this.sortField+"&sysparm_force_row_count="+this.recordsPerChunk+"&sysparm_order_direction=asc";
         var sysIdMarkerStr = probe.getParameter('sysIDMarkers');
         this.sysIDMarkers = sysIdMarkerStr.split(",");
      }
      
      this.host = probe.getParameter('host');
      this.transportMethod = probe.getParameter('transportMethod');
      
      if (this.debug){
         this.log("\n**********  Debug Info **********\nuser: " + this.user + "\npass: " + this.password + "\ntransportMethod: " + this.transportMethod + "\nreport: " + this.reportURL+ "\nhost: "+ this.host+ this.filter+ "\nfilter: "+ this.filter + "\nchunkData: " + this.chunkData + "\nnumberOfChunks: " + this.numberOfChunks + "\nrecordsPerChunk: " + this.recordsPerChunk);
         this.log("\n**********  Proxy Info **********\nproxyNeeded: " + this.proxyNeeded +"\nproxyUser : " + this.proxyUser + "\nproxyPass :" + this.proxyPass );
         this.log("\nproxyHost: " + this.proxyHost + "\nproxyPort:" + this.proxyPort);
         this.log("\n**********  FTP Info ************\nftpUser: "+ this.ftpUser + "\nftpPass: " + this.ftpPass + "\nftpPort: " + this.ftpPort);
         this.log("\n**********  End of Debug ********\n\n");
      }
      this.response = this.execute();
      
   },
   
   getConfigParameter: function(parm){
      var m= Packages.com.service_now.mid.MIDServer.get();
      var config = m.getConfig();
      var res = config.getParameter(parm);
      var res2 = config.getProperty(parm);
      if (res){
         return res;
      }
      else if (res2){
         return res2;
      }
      else{
         config = Packages.com.service_now.mid.services.Config.get();
         return config.getProperty(parm);
      }
      
   },
   
   decryptCredentials: function(data) {
      var cred = String(data);
      var e = new Packages.com.glide.util.Encrypter();
      
      var jsCred = cred + '';
      var usernamePass = e.decrypt(jsCred);
      var credArr = usernamePass.split(":", 2);
      return credArr;
   },
   
   saveToFile: function(data, targetPath) {
      var tmpLoc;
      var result = true;
      var out;
      
      try{
         if (this.transportMethod == "Mid Server"){
            tmpLoc = targetPath;
         }
         else{
            tmpLoc = this.MIDSERVER_FILE_PATH + this.MIDSERVER_FILE_NAME;
         }
         out = new Packages.java.io.PrintWriter(new Packages.java.io.FileWriter(tmpLoc));
         out.print(data);
         
         this.log("File saved to: " + tmpLoc);
      }
      catch(e){
         this.log("Exception caught in CFDataRetriever->saveToFile: " + e.getMessage());
         result = false;
      }
      out.close();
      return result;
   },
   
   
   copyToSFTP: function() {
      this.log('Arriving to function copyToSFTP');
      
      var tmpLoc;
      var connectionType;
      var connected = true;
      var connectionLog = '';
      var sftpSuccess=true;
      if (this.transportMethod == "SFTP (RSA)"){
         try {
            keyfile = this.MIDSERVER_PRIVATE_KEY_PATH+'id_rsa';
            sshfile = new Packages.com.sshtools.j2ssh.transport.publickey.SshPrivateKeyFile.parse(new Packages.java.io.File(keyfile));
            //this.log('key format'+sshfile.getFormat());
            //this.log('key value'+sshfile.toString());
            pk = new Packages.com.sshtools.j2ssh.authentication.PublicKeyAuthenticationClient();
            //this.log('PUBLIC KEY METHOD'+pk.getMethodName());
            pk.setUsername(this.ftpUser);
            pk.setKey(sshfile.toPrivateKey(null));
         }
         catch(e1){
            connectionLog += "\nException Reading RSA Key: " + e1;
            sftpSuccess=false;
         }
      }
      else if (this.transportMethod == "SFTP (DSA)"){
         try {
            keyfile = this.MIDSERVER_PRIVATE_KEY_PATH+'id_dsa';
            sshfile = new Packages.com.sshtools.j2ssh.transport.publickey.SshPrivateKeyFile.parse(new Packages.java.io.File(keyfile));
            //this.log('key format'+sshfile.getFormat());
            //this.log('key value'+sshfile.toString());
            pk = new Packages.com.sshtools.j2ssh.authentication.PublicKeyAuthenticationClient();
            //this.log('PUBLIC KEY METHOD'+pk.getMethodName());
            pk.setUsername(this.ftpUser);
            pk.setKey(sshfile.toPrivateKey(null));
         }
         catch(e2){
            this.log("Exception Reading DSA Key: " + e2);
            sftpSuccess=false;
         }
      }
      else if (this.transportMethod == "SFTP (Password)"){
         pk = new Packages.com.sshtools.j2ssh.authentication.PasswordAuthenticationClient();
         pk.setUsername(this.ftpUser);
         pk.setPassword(this.ftpPass);
      }
      var ssh = new Packages.com.sshtools.j2ssh.SshClient();
      var ignoreHost = new Packages.com.sshtools.j2ssh.transport.IgnoreHostKeyVerification();
      try {
         ssh.connect(this.ftpTargetServer,ignoreHost);
      }
      catch(e3){
         this.log("Exception Connecting to SFTP Host: " + e3);
         sftpSuccess=false;
      }
      authState = new Packages.com.sshtools.j2ssh.authentication.AuthenticationProtocolState();
      if(ssh.authenticate(pk)==authState.COMPLETE){
         this.log('SSH REMOTE AUTHENTICATE==TRUE');
         var sftp = ssh.openSftpClient();
         try{
            var pwd = new Packages.java.io.File(".").getAbsolutePath();// Work directory
            pwd = pwd.slice(0,-1);
            sftp.lcd(pwd + this.MIDSERVER_FILE_PATH);
            //sftp.lcd("C:\\agent\\work");
         }
         catch(e4){
            this.log('Error in Sftp set local directory: '+e4);
            sftpSuccess=false;
         }
         try{
            sftp.cd(this.targetPath);
         }
         catch(e5){
            this.log('Error in Sftp set remote directory: '+e5);
            sftpSuccess=false;
         }
         if(sftpSuccess==true){
            try {
               sftp.put(this.MIDSERVER_FILE_NAME);
               this.log('Successfully copied file: '+this.MIDSERVER_FILE_NAME+' to '+this.ftpTargetServer+':'+this.targetPath);// File (or directory) to be moved
            }
            catch(e6) {
               this.log('Error in Sftp put: '+e6);
               sftpSuccess=false;
            }
         }
      }
      else{
         connectionLog += "\n**********FAILURE: Connection to SFTP server failed**************\n";
      }
      this.log(connectionLog);
      return sftpSuccess;
   },
   
   
   copyToFTP: function() {
      var tmpLoc;
      var connectionType;
      var ftpSuccess = false;
      var connection;
      var connectionLog;
      var connected;
      var fromFile;
      var toFile;
      
      if (this.transportMethod == "FTPS (Auth SSL)"){
         connectionType = "AUTH_SSL_FTP_CONNECTION";
         if (!this.ftpPort) {this.ftpPort = 21;}
         }
      else if (this.transportMethod == "FTPS (Auth TLS)"){
         connectionType = "AUTH_TLS_FTP_CONNECTION";
         if (!this.ftpPort) {this.ftpPort = 21;}
         }
      else if (this.transportMethod == "FTPS (Implicit SSL)"){
         connectionType = "IMPLICIT_SSL_FTP_CONNECTION";
         if (!this.ftpPort) {this.ftpPort = 990;}
         }
      else if (this.transportMethod == "FTPS (Implicit TLS)"){
         connectionType = "IMPLICIT_TLS_FTP_CONNECTION";
         if (!this.ftpPort) {this.ftpPort = 990;}
         }
      else{
         connectionType = "FTP_CONNECTION";
         if (!this.ftpPort) {this.ftpPort = 21;}
         }
      this.log("ConnectionType: " + connectionType + " and port: " + this.ftpPort);
      
      var pt = new Packages.java.util.Properties();
      pt.setProperty("connection.host", this.ftpTargetServer);
      pt.setProperty("connection.port", this.ftpPort);
      pt.setProperty("user.login", this.ftpUser);
      pt.setProperty("user.password", this.ftpPass);
      pt.setProperty("connection.type", connectionType);
      pt.setProperty("connection.timeout", "100000");
      pt.setProperty("connection.passive", "true");
      
      try{
         connection = Packages.org.ftp4che.FTPConnectionFactory.getInstance(pt);
         
         fromFile = new Packages.org.ftp4che.util.ftpfile.FTPFile(this.MIDSERVER_FILE_PATH, this.MIDSERVER_FILE_NAME);
         toFile = new Packages.org.ftp4che.util.ftpfile.FTPFile(this.targetPath, this.targetFileName);
      }
      catch(e7){
         
      }
      connectionLog = "Connection Log:\n";
      connected = false;
      try{
         connection.connect();
         this.log("Connecting to " + this.ftpTargetServer + " on port " +  this.ftpPort);
         
         connection.noOperation();
         connected = true;
      }
      catch(e8){
         connectionLog += "\nException in block B: " + e8;
         connected = false;
      }
      
      if (connected == true){
         try{
            this.log("Connected...");
            this.log("Uploading " + fromFile + " to " + toFile);
            connection.uploadFile(fromFile, toFile);
            this.log("File successfully uploaded\n\n");
            connection.disconnect();
            ftpSuccess = true;
         }
         catch(e9){
            connectionLog += "\n**********FAILURE: Connection to FTP server failed**************\n";
            connectionLog += "\nException in block C: \n" + e9;
         }
      }
      else{
         connectionLog += "\n**********FAILURE: Connection to FTP server failed**************\n";
      }
      
      this.log(connectionLog);
      return ftpSuccess;
   },
   
   moveProcessedFile: function(){
      
      file = new Packages.java.io.File(this.MIDSERVER_FILE_PATH+this.MIDSERVER_FILE_NAME);// Work directory
      dir = new Packages.java.io.File(this.MIDSERVER_PROCESSED_FILE_PATH);// Move file to new (processed) directory
      success = file.renameTo(new Packages.java.io.File(dir, file.getName()));
      
      if (!success) {
         this.log('File was not successfully moved!');
      }
      else{
         this.log("File was moved from TMP directory to a processed directory");
      }
   },
   
   getReport: function() {
      var responseBody = "";
      this.log("Arriving to getReport function");
      var client = new Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient();
      //client.setTimeout(600000);
      client.setConnectionTimeout(0);
      client.setTimeout(0);
      
      ////Set Proxy if (if there is one)
      if (this.useProxy && this.useProxy.toLowerCase() == "true"){
         client.getHostConfiguration().setProxy(this.proxyHost, this.proxyPort);
         if (this.proxyUser){
            client.getState().setProxyCredentials(new Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.auth.AuthScope(this.proxyHost, this.proxyPort), new Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.UsernamePasswordCredentials(this.proxyUser, this.proxyPass));
         }
      }
      
      client.getState().setCredentials(new Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.auth.AuthScope(null, 443, null), new Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.UsernamePasswordCredentials(this.user, this.password));
      
      try{
         if (this.chunkData){
            for (var i = 0; i < this.numberOfChunks; i++){
               this.log("Executing chunk #"+i);
               
               resData = this._executeCall(client, this.sysIDMarkers[i]);
               if (i != 0)
                  resData = resData.substring(resData.indexOf('\n')+1);
               
               responseBody += resData;
               this.log("Done executing chunk #"+i);
            }
         }
         else{
            this.log("Fetching data in 1 call.");
            responseBody = this._executeCall(client);
         }
      }
      catch(e){
         this.log("Exception caught in CFDataRetriever->getReport: " + e.getMessage());
      }
      
      return responseBody;
      
   },
   
   _executeCall : function(client, pageNextID){
      
      var dest = this.reportURL;
      var chunkLocationQry = "";
      
      if (!pageNextID.nil() && pageNextID){
         chunkLocationQry = this.sortField+"%3E%3D" + pageNextID;
         dest += this.parmQuery.replace("EQ", "") + chunkLocationQry;
      }
      else
         if (this.parmQuery)
         dest += this.parmQuery;
      //dest += this.parmQuery + chunkLocationQry;
      var reportCleanForMethod = dest.replace(">", "%3E").replace(" ", "%20").replace("^", "%5E");
      
      this.log('Final report url: ' + reportCleanForMethod);
      try{
         method = new Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.GetMethod(reportCleanForMethod);
         method.setDoAuthentication(true);
         var statusCode = client.executeMethod(method);
         
         if (statusCode != Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpStatus.SC_OK) {
            this.log("Method failed: " + method.getStatusLine());
         }
         
         // Read the response body.
         responseBody = method.getResponseBodyAsString();
         //this.log("responseBody: " +responseBody);
         
         method.releaseConnection();
         this.log("Releasing Connection");
      }
      catch(e){
         this.log("Exception caught in CFDataRetriever->_executeCall: " + e.getMessage());
      }
      
      return responseBody;
      
   },
   
   getLog: function() {
      return this.resLog;
   },
   
   log: function(data) {
      ms.log(data);
      this.resLog+="\n"+data;
   },
   
   isANumber: function(data) {
      data = data + '';
      return ((data - 0) == data && data.length > 0);
   },
   
   
   execute: function() {
      this.log("Running CFDataRetriever execute");
      
      var pushRes = true;
      var reportContents = this.getReport();
      if (reportContents){
         var saveRes = this.saveToFile(reportContents, this.targetPath+ this.targetFileName);
         if (this.transportMethod.indexOf('SFTP') != -1 ){
            pushRes = this.copyToSFTP();
         }
         else if (this.transportMethod.indexOf('FTP') != -1 ){
            pushRes = this.copyToFTP();
         }
         //Move tmp file to a processed directory
         if (saveRes && pushRes && this.moveProcessedFiles && this.transportMethod.indexOf('Mid') == -1){
            this.moveProcessedFile();
         }
      }
      else{
         this.log("The report was empty?");
      }
   },
   
   type: 'CFDataRetriever'
};</script><sys_created_by>crossfuze</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2012-06-04 15:38:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>2441116774122000b75c5c34e1befad9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>107</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>jacob@crossfuze.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2013-04-17 05:06:20</sys_updated_on></ecc_agent_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_dc5c260589613400d858515d61429499
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Used with the CrossFuze Data Extract</description><name>DELIMProcessor</name><script>var DELIMProcessor = Class.create();

DELIMProcessor.prototype = new JSONProcessor();
/**
 * Constructor - constructs a JSONProcessor object to first generate a JSON
 * object (Requires the JSON plugin), then allows us to convert to delimited
 * text format instead.
 *
 * @param request -
 *          HttpServletRequest object
 * @param response -
 *          HttpServletResponse object
 * @param table_name -
 *          the targeted table name in the URL
 * @processor - the Processor Java class that is handling this process
 */
DELIMProcessor.prototype.initialize = function(request, response, table_name, processor) {
   JSONProcessor.prototype.initialize.call(this, request, response, table_name, processor);
   this._setURLParameter("delimiter");
   if (this.sysparm['delimiter'])
      this.delimiter = this.sysparm['delimiter'];
   else
      this.delimiter = '|DELIMITER NOT DEFINED|';
   this.enableDebug = true;
};


/**
 * Entry point into DELIMProcessor class, called from the processor, right
 * after object instantiation. Assumes correct specification of sysparm_*
 * parameters or specified as DELIM object field value
 */
DELIMProcessor.prototype.process = function() {
   var responseArray;
   
   if (this.sysparm['action'] == "getRecords")
      responseArray = this.getRecords();
   else
      this._outputDELIMError("Invalid sysparm_action: {0}",
   this.sysparm['action']);
   
   if (this.error){
      this.debug("There was an error: " + this.error);
      return; // there was an error
   }
   
   if (responseArray == null){
      this.debug("There was no response");
      return; // there is no response
   }
   
   var delimText = this.convertToDelimitedText(responseArray, this.delimiter, "");
   this.debug("Delimited Text: " + delimText);
   this._outputDelimitedTextResponse(delimText);
};

/**
 * getRecords - use sysparm_query for endcoded query
 */
DELIMProcessor.prototype.getRecords = function() {
   this.debug("getRecords with query: " + this.sysparm['query']);
   
   var responseArray = new Array();
   var gr = new GlideRecord(this.table_name);
   
   var gsm;
   if (typeof GlideSecurityManager != 'undefined')
      gsm = GlideSecurityManager.tableLevelACLAllow(gr, "read");
   else
      gsm = Packages.com.glide.sys.security.GlideSecurityManager.tableLevelACLAllow(gr, "read");
   if(!gsm) {
      this._outputJSONError("Insufficient rights to query records: {0}", this.table_name);
      return null;
   }
   
   var kount = 0;
   if (this.sysparm['query'])
      gr.addEncodedQuery(this.sysparm['query']);
   gr.query();
   while (gr.next()) {
      if (!gr.canRead())
         continue;
      this._gatherRecord(gr, responseArray);
      kount++;
      
      if (kount > this.rowLimit) {
         this.debug("getRecords row limit " + this.rowLimit + " reached");
         break;
      }
   }
   
   return responseArray;
};

/**
 * This converts a JSON object into a delimited string
 * @param rArray - the JSON response array (or portion thereof)
 * @param delimiter - The delimiter to be using
 * @param textSoFar - Delimited Text generated so far
 * @return textSoFar
 */
DELIMProcessor.prototype.convertToDelimitedText = function(rArray, delimiter, textSoFar){
   var recordText = "";
   var headerText = "";
   for(var field in rArray){
      if(typeof rArray[field] == "object"){
         textSoFar = this.convertToDelimitedText(rArray[field], delimiter, textSoFar);
      } else {
         if(!textSoFar){ //also build header row
            if( headerText ) {
            headerText += this.delimiter;
         }
         headerText += "\"" + field + "\"";
      }
      if( recordText ){
         recordText += this.delimiter;
      }
      recordText += "\"" + rArray[field] + "\"";
   }
}
return headerText + textSoFar + "\n" + recordText;
};

/**
 * output a Delimited error object
 */
DELIMProcessor.prototype._outputDELIMError = function(errorMsg, arg) {
   var msg = gs.getMessage(errorMsg, String(arg));
   var response = {
      "error" : msg
   };
   this._outputDELIMResponse(response);
   this.error = true;
};

/**
 * write out the response to http response with the correct content-type
 */
DELIMProcessor.prototype._outputDELIMResponse = function(response) {
   var r = this._outputDelimitedTextResponse(response);
   this.response.setContentType("text/tab-delimited-values");
   this.processor.writeOutput(r);
};

/**
 * Output the delimited text to the http response with content-type
 * @param delimitedText
 * @return
 */
DELIMProcessor.prototype._outputDelimitedTextResponse = function(delimitedText){
   this.response.setContentType("text/tab-delimited-values");
   this.processor.writeOutput(delimitedText);
};

// debugging log, to turn off, set this.enableDebug = false
DELIMProcessor.prototype.debug = function(msg) {
   if (!this.enableDebug)
      return;
   
   gs.log("DELIMProcessor: " + msg);
};</script><sys_created_by>crossfuze</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2012-11-05 17:15:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>dc5c260589613400d858515d61429499</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>jacob@crossfuze.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2013-02-13 20:44:27</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_processor_f86d9215ad388140d858a0c17d04766b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_processor"><sys_processor action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><class_name/><description/><name>CF_XML</name><parameters>CF_XML</parameters><path/><roles/><script>//sysparm_table,sysparm_query,sysparm_reference
buildXML();

function buildXML() {
   var table = g_request.getParameter("sysparm_table");
   var encQuery = g_request.getParameter("sysparm_query");
   
   var resXML = "";
   
   var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
   if (encQuery)
      gr.addEncodedQuery(encQuery);
   if (!table)
      g_processor.writeOutput("No table defined");
   else if (!gr.canRead())
      g_processor.writeOutput("Access denied");
   else{
      gr.query();
      resXML += '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>\n';
      resXML += "<xml>\n";
      while(gr.next()){
         resXML += "<"+table+">\n";
         resXML += getAllElements(gr);
         resXML += "</"+table+">\n";
      }
      resXML += "</xml>";
      g_processor.writeOutput(resXML);
   }
}
function getAllElements(gr){
   var resStr = "";
   var refView = g_request.getParameter("sysparm_reference");
   var fields = gr.getFields();
   
   // Enumerate GlideElements in the GlideRecord object that have values
   for (var i = 0; i < fields.size(); i++) {
      var glideElement = fields.get(i);
      if (glideElement.hasValue()) {
         if (refView == "displayValue")
            resStr += addElement(glideElement.getName(), glideElement.getDisplayValue());
         else
            resStr += addElement(glideElement.getName(), glideElement);
      }
      else
         resStr += addElement(glideElement.getName(), "");
   }
   
   return resStr;
}

function addElement(name, value){
   if (value)
      return "<"+name+">"+value+"</"+name+">\n";
   else
      return "<"+name+"/>\n";
}

</script><sys_created_by>jacob@crossfuze.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-04-17 00:13:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>f86d9215ad388140d858a0c17d04766b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>jacob@crossfuze.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2013-04-17 05:13:53</sys_updated_on><type>script</type></sys_processor></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_6d3f892774122000b75c5c34e1befa7a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><client_callable>false</client_callable><description> The 'host' parameter is defined by the glide.servlet.uri property.</description><name>CrossFuzeDataExtract</name><script>var CrossFuzeDataExtract= Class.create();

CrossFuzeDataExtract.prototype = {
   initialize: function() {
      this.sortField = current.u_chunking_sort_field;
   },
   
   sendDataExtractProbe: function(){
      var jp         = new JavascriptProbe(current.u_mid_server.name);
      var host       = gs.getProperty("glide.servlet.uri");
      var recPerChunk = current.u_records_per_chunk;
      //var recPerChunk = 10;
      //Encrypt both SN and FTP credentials
      //
      var e;
      if (typeof GlideEncrypter != 'undefined')
         e = new GlideEncrypter();
      else
         e = new Packages.com.glide.util.Encrypter();
      
      var strFtpCred = current.u_target_server_username + ":" + this.getEncPassword(current.u_target_server_password);
      var ftpCred    = e.encrypt(strFtpCred);
      //
      //////
      
      var reportURL;
      var numberOfChunks = 0;
      var view = "";
      var since = "";
      
      
      if (current.u_use_last_run_datetime && current.u_last_run_datetime){
         jp.addParameter("lastRunDateTime", escape(current.u_last_run_datetime));
      }
      
      if (current.u_format == "XML"){
         jp.addParameter("referenceFields", current.u_reference_fields);
      }
      
      if (current.u_view){
         if (current.u_view.toLowerCase() != "default"){
            view = "&sysparm_view=" + current.u_view;
         }
      }
      
      if (current.u_source.getDisplayValue() == "Report Data"){
         reportURL  = host + 'sys_report_template.do?jvar_report_id=' +current.u_report+view+since;
      }
      else{
         reportURL  = host + current.u_table+'_list.do?' + view.replace('&', '') + since;
         jp.addParameter("table",current.u_table);
         if (current.u_implement_data_chunking ){
            //numberOfChunks = this.getNumberOfRecords(recPerChunk);
            jp.addParameter("chunkData",current.u_implement_data_chunking);
            //jp.addParameter("numberOfChunks",numberOfChunks);
            jp.addParameter("recordsPerChunk",recPerChunk);
            
            var sysIDMarkers = this.getSysIdMarkers(recPerChunk, current.u_table);
            
            jp.addParameter("numberOfChunks",sysIDMarkers.length);
            jp.addParameter("sysIDMarkers",sysIDMarkers.join(','));
         }
      }
      
      
      
      var targetFileName = current.u_target_filename;
      if( current.u_append_timestamp){
         tsFilename = "" + current.u_target_filename;
         var fileParts = /(^.+)\.([^.]+)$/.exec(tsFilename);
         if( fileParts && fileParts.length > 2){
            var fileName = fileParts[1];
            var fileExt = fileParts[2];
            tsFilename = fileName + "-" + gs.nowDateTime().replace(/\s|:/g, "_");
            tsFilename += "." + fileExt;
         } else {
            tsFilename += "-" + gs.nowDateTime().replace(/\s|:/g, "_");
         }
         targetFileName = tsFilename ;
         jp.addParameter("targetFileName", tsFilename );
      }
      
      else{
         jp.addParameter("targetFileName", targetFileName );
      }
      jp.addParameter("ftpTargetServer", current.u_target_server);
      jp.addParameter("ftpCred", ftpCred);
      jp.addParameter("ftpPort", current.u_ftp_port);
      jp.addParameter("format", current.u_format);
      jp.addParameter("delimiter", current.u_delimiter);
      jp.addParameter("reportURL", reportURL);
      jp.addParameter("host",host);
      jp.addParameter("sortField",this.sortField);
      jp.addParameter("filter", current.u_filter);
      jp.addParameter("targetPath",current.u_target_path);
      jp.addParameter("transportMethod",current.u_transport_method);
      jp.addParameter("skip_sensor", 'true');
      
      gs.addInfoMessage("Probe sent to MID Server to send SOAP msg");
      
      jp.setName("CFDataRetriever");
      jp.setJavascript("var req = new CFDataRetriever();req.getLog()");
      current.probe = jp.create();
      
      
      if (current.u_use_last_run_datetime){
         current.u_last_run_datetime = gs.nowDateTime();
      }
      
      current.update();
   },
   
   getNumberOfRecords : function (recPerChunk){
      var gr = new GlideAggregate(current.u_table);
      gr.addEncodedQuery(current.u_filter);
      gr.addAggregate('COUNT');
      gr.query();
      if (gr.next()){
         var num = gr.getAggregate('COUNT') / recPerChunk;
         return parseInt(num) + 1;
      }
      else
         return 1;
   },
   
   getSysIdMarkers : function (recPerChunk, table){
      var i=0;
      var idArr = [];
      var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
      gr.orderBy(this.sortField);
      gr.addEncodedQuery(current.u_filter);
      gr.query();
      while(gr.next()){
         if (i % recPerChunk == 0){
            var tmpVal = gr.getValue(this.sortField);
            if (tmpVal)
               idArr.push(tmpVal.toString());
         }
         i++;
      }
      
      return idArr;
   },
   
   getEncPassword: function(encrypted) {
      var Encrypter;
      if (typeof GlideEncrypter != 'undefined')
         Encrypter = new GlideEncrypter();
      else
         Encrypter = new Packages.com.glide.util.Encrypter();
      return Encrypter.decrypt(encrypted);
   },
   
   type: CrossFuzeDataExtract
};</script><sys_created_by>crossfuze</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2012-06-04 15:32:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>6d3f892774122000b75c5c34e1befa7a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>58</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>jacob@crossfuze.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2013-04-17 05:00:19</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

current.u_records_per_chunk = Math.min(xmlLimit, exportLimit);</calculation><choice/><choice_field/><choice_table/><comments/><create_roles/><default_value/><defaultsort/><delete_roles/><dependent/><display>false</display><dynamic_creation>false</dynamic_creation><dynamic_creation_script/><element>u_records_per_chunk</element><element_reference>false</element_reference><foreign_database/><internal_type>integer</internal_type><mandatory>false</mandatory><max_length>40</max_length><name>u_crossfuze_data_extract</name><primary>false</primary><read_only>false</read_only><read_roles/><reference/><reference_cascade_rule/><reference_floats>false</reference_floats><reference_qual/><reference_type/><sizeclass/><spell_check>false</spell_check><sys_class_name>sys_dictionary</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jacob</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-02-26 16:28:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>ef7d58a5b1f7f40079bf88fc4d9d050e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>jacob</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2013-02-26 16:31:17</sys_updated_on><table_reference>false</table_reference><text_index>false</text_index><u_model_id/><u_normalize_set/><unique>false</unique><virtual>true</virtual><widget/><write_roles/><xml_view>false</xml_view></sys_dictionary>

sys_update_xml.payload: trueu_source=Report Data^EQtruefalsetrue100truetruefunction onCondition() { try{ //Set File format selector var format = g_form.getValue('u_format'); g_form.clearOptions('u_format'); g_form.addOption('u_format', 'CSV', 'CSV'); g_form.addOption('u_format', 'CSV DELIM', 'CSV DELIM'); g_form.addOption('u_format', 'XML', 'XML'); g_form.addOption('u_format', 'RSS', 'RSS'); g_form.setValue('u_format', format); var section = $$('span[tab_caption="Data filtering"]')[0].select('span[id*=section.]')[0]; section.show(); } catch(e){} }function onCondition() { try{ //Set File format selector g_form.removeOption('u_format', 'XML'); g_form.removeOption('u_format', 'RSS'); g_form.removeOption('u_format', 'CSV DELIM'); //Should not be able to pull deltas for Report data g_form.setValue('u_use_last_run_datetime', false); var section = $$('span[tab_caption="Data filtering"]')[0].select('span[id*=section.]')[0]; section.hide(); } catch(e){} }Report or Table Fieldcrossfuze2012-06-04 15:20:59global5b3dc12774122000b75c5c34e1befa9d10jacob@crossfuze.com2013-02-18 23:49:10u_crossfuze_data_extract
